## Read in the website:
https://waterdata.usgs.gov/monitoring-location/11118500/#parameterCode=00065&period=P7D
```{r}
#Ventura River
siteNumber <- "11118500"
parameterCd <- "00060"  # Discharge
startDate <- "2019-10-01"  
endDate <- "2020-10-05" 

discharge <- readNWISdv(siteNumber,parameterCd, startDate, endDate)
```
